name: Contract Killer 2: Shadow Conspiracy
storyline: Jack Griffin, a former member of the IPF, has been outcasted. Now, the former legendary contract killer now works as a vigilante, alongside complete stranger Angela and former Friend and russian mafia leader Dmitry Kozlov, Griffin must now assassinate and fight his way through.
summary: You are Jack Griffin, the ultimate Contract Killer. Experience an intense, international storyline combining long-range kill shots and close-range melee attacks. To survive in this line of work, you have to sneak your way in, shoot your way out!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Contract Killer 2, Now Available on iOS and Android!
